awards.name: Regeneron Science Talent Search (STS) Scholar
awards.description: Selected as one of the top 300 most promising young scientists/engineers in the nation's oldest and most prestigious research competition.

awards.name: Regeneron International Science and Engineering Fair (ISEF) Finalist
awards.description: Named a finalist in the largest and most prestigious precollegiate science/engineering fair in the world.

bullets: - Spearheaded novel deep learning models for few-view radiographic CT imaging, reducing radiation dosage by 95% and costs by 91%
- Presented to Penn Radiology faculty, submitted to 2021 Fully3D Imaging Conference, IEEE Transactions in Medical Imaging Journal (IF 10)
- 2021 Regeneron Science Talent Search (STS) Scholar, Regeneron International Science and Engineering Fair (ISEF) Finalist
- Developed human-augmented UAS navigation and planning algorithms with Dr. Nisar Ahmed of Cooperative Human-Robot Intel Lab
- Built online sketch data collection portal for human-augmented navigational machine learning
- Projects sponsored/funded by US Department of Defense, NASA, and Raytheon
